submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, food: List[int], drink: int) -> int:
        plate = []
        fork = 0
        knife = 1
        num_served = 0
    
        while knife < len(food) + drink and fork < len(food):
            spoon = knife
            bowl = spoon % len(food)  
            while food[bowl] != food[bowl - 1] and (spoon < (len(food) + drink - 1)):
                spoon += 1
                bowl = spoon % len(food)

            num_served += max(spoon - fork - drink + 1, 0)
            fork = spoon
            knife = fork + 1
        return num_served
